casebody.data:
Recovery Alliance, Inc. v. Department of Revenue Services, Division of Special Revenue (12361)

Foti, Hennessy and Cretella, Js.

Argued September 29 decision released October 18, 1994 Francis W. Benner, for the appellant-appellee (plaintiff). Richard M. Sheridan, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellee-appellant (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
